Cody Miller
Front-End Web Developer

Hi, I'm Cody Miller

I'm a passionate front-end web developer that is always looking for something exciting to create and something new to learn. I have always held a deep love for technology and building things (especially with Legos!), and I recently decided to fully embrace my dream to become a programmer. I worked in Special Education for ten years, and I always especially enjoyed the quiet moments where I could organize and input our data digitally. I finally decided to pursue the career I always dreamed of, and now I've reached my goal, and found a passion for Javascript and React along the way!

When I'm not coding, you can find me either hiking, rock climbing, or building a Lego set with a hot cup of coffee beside me. I also enjoy volunteering at my local church every Sunday, where I care for a group of kids with Special Needs that I've cared for for over 7 years now. I'm an avid reader as well, and you can almost always find a book close at hand if you're with me.

If you are interested in hearing more about me or how I can contribute to whatever dream you're pursuing, I'd love to hear from you!
